cost-savings.ts
const analyzeSavings = async () => {
  const metrics = await getCloudMetrics({
    timeframe: 'quarter',
    services: ['ec2', 's3', 'rds'],
  });

  // Optimization opportunities detected
  return {
    potentialSavings: 50_000,  // $50k / month
    reductionRate: 0.37,
    timeToImpact: '2 weeks',
  };
};
